dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset contains 7,481 scenes as training samples and 7,518 scenes as testing samples, providing point clouds of eight types of objects.
dcterms:title: KITTI Dataset

dcterms:description: The Waymo dataset is composed of 798 sequences for training and 202 sequences for validation, providing abundant foreground information for nearly every scenario and offering annotations encompassing the entire scene.
dcterms:title: Waymo Dataset
